existing_features.title: Update the Location section so the primary address text shown to users is exactly: "Jandi Mor, GT road, Gujar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan" (including when restaurant profile data is unavailable).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the location/address text to: "Jandi Mor, GT road, Gujar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan"

Update the backend default restaurant profile address fields so that the structured address renders as "Jandi Mor, GT road, Gujar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan" without repeating "Gujar Khan" in the street field.

projectName: Update displayed restaurant location to “Jandi Mor, GT road, Gujar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan”
